entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 24. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 06:09 AM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023
